dm:bugtracker.dm:product: SUSE Enterprise Storage on Ampere eMag

abstract.para: The objective of this document is to present a step-by-step guide on how to implement SUSE Enterprise Storage® (6) on the Ampere® eMAG platform. It is suggested that the document be read in its entirety, along with the supplemental appendix information before attempting the process.
